title: Bloomberg Markets: Son on JPMorgan's Moonshot Man

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Hugh Son Finance Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing his story "JPMorgan’s Moonshot Man Wants to Help Wall Street Fire Its Traders."
